thread.title: Valencia Real Madrid: West Ham flop Simone Zaza’s stunning goal blows La Liga title race wide open as Cristiano Ronaldo fails to prevent defeat with goal in his 700th professional appearance

author: sstreet
title: Valencia Real Madrid: West Ham flop Simone Zaza’s stunning goal blows La Liga title race wide open as Cristiano Ronaldo fails to prevent defeat with goal in his 700th professional appearance
text:
EFL ZAZA ZOOM Valencia Real Madrid: West Ham flop Simone Zaza’s stunning goal blows La Liga title race wide open as Cristiano Ronaldo fails to prevent defeat with goal in his 700th professional appearance 
Zaza's incredible half volley and goal from Fabian Orellana ensure Ronaldo's bullet header is no more than a consolation By SAM STREET
